1. Preheat the oven to 200°C (400°F). 
2. Beat the eggs lightly for 1 min. 
3. Add the oil and milk and beat until combined. Then add the sugar and mix until you have a smooth batter. 
4. Sift in flour, baking powder and salt and mix carefully until just smooth. 
5. Stir in chocolate chips. 
6. Fill muffin cases two-thirds full and bake for 20-25 minutes. When a skewer is inserted in the middle, it should come out clean. 
7. Leave the muffins in the tin to cool for a few mins then transfer to a wire rack.
For chocolate muffins, replace 100g of the flour with 100g cocoa powder.
